forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
A gentle golden hour graces Downtown San Francisco, casting a warm light over a city that seems to breathe deeply after a pleasant day. The sun has settled into a soft embrace with the horizon, allowing the skyline to stand proudly against a backdrop of cerulean. While the high temperature lingers near 66, a fresh westerly breeze weaves through the streets, harmonizing with the rhythm of urban life. With occasional gusts, this wind stirs a sense of vitality, inviting passersby to savor the moment outdoors.

As twilight approaches, shadows lengthen, and a light veil of clouds threatens a slight drizzle just after nightfall, hinting at the possibility of a marine layer creeping in from the bay. The forecast suggests a low of around 57, urging those venturing out to consider an extra layer—a light jacket or cozy sweater would be fit for the occasion. A stroll along the piers or a quiet visit to a neighborhood café could be a delightful way to spend the evening, soaking in the beauty of the city as it transitions into night. With the chance of precipitation resting comfortably at 20%, the evening presents just enough allure to leave an umbrella at home, choosing instead to embrace the cool, refreshing air.
